title: Punishment for murder
description: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.
punishment: Death or imprisonment for life and fine
example_incidents: A person intentionally kills another person; A contract killer murders someone for money

title: Punishment for murder by life-convict
description: When any person who is a life convict commits murder, he shall be punished with death or imprisonment for life, which shall mean imprisonment for the remainder of that person's natural life, and shall also be liable to fine.
punishment: Death or imprisonment for natural life and fine
example_incidents: A prisoner serving life sentence kills another inmate

title: Punishment for murder by a group of persons
description: When a group of five or more persons acting in concert commits murder on the ground of race, caste or community, sex, place of birth, language, personal belief or any other ground, each member of such group shall be punishable with death or with imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.
punishment: Death or imprisonment for life and fine
example_incidents: A mob lynches a person based on caste; A group targets someone based on religion

title: Causing death by negligence
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: A doctor's negligence causes patient's death; Reckless driving causes fatal accident

title: Causing death by negligence in discharge of professional duty
description: Whoever, being a registered medical practitioner, causes the death of any person by a rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide, which act was done in the discharge of his professional duty, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to five years, and shall also be liable to fine.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years and fine
example_incidents: A surgeon leaves a surgical instrument inside a patient; Wrong medication leads to patient's death

title: Causing death by rash or negligent driving
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpability, while driving or riding any vehicle, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to five years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Drunk driving causes fatal accident; Speeding leads to pedestrian death

title: Causing death by rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Negligent handling of electrical wires causes electrocution

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent navigation of vessel
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by rash or negligent navigation of any vessel, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to five years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Boat capsize due to overloading; Ship accident due to negligence

title: Causing death by negligence relating to aircraft
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by rash or negligent act or omission in respect of any aircraft, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to five years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Aircraft crash due to poor maintenance; Pilot error causes fatal accident

title: Causing death by negligence relating to railway operations
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by rash or negligent act or omission in respect of any railway, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to five years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Train accident due to signal failure; Railway crossing accident due to negligence

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to machinery
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act in respect of any machinery, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Factory accident due to unguarded machinery; Construction site fatality due to equipment failure

title: Causing death by negligence relating to poisonous substance
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with any poisonous substance, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Food poisoning from contaminated food; Toxic gas leak due to negligence

title: Causing death by negligence relating to explosive substance
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with any explosive substance, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Fireworks factory explosion; Gas cylinder explosion due to negligence

title: Causing death by negligence relating to animal
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any animal in his possession, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Pet dog attack due to owner's negligence; Elephant rampage due to improper handling

title: Causing death by negligence relating to building or property
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any building or property, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Building collapse due to poor construction; Falling object from construction site

title: Causing death by negligence relating to medical treatment
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by rash or negligent act or omission in respect of medical treatment, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Wrong diagnosis leads to death; Surgical error during operation

title: Causing death by negligence relating to food or drink
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by selling any article of food or drink which is noxious, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to six months, or with fine which may extend to one thousand rupees, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 6 months, or fine up to â‚¹1,000, or both
example_incidents: Selling adulterated liquor; Food poisoning from contaminated food

title: Causing death by negligence relating to adulteration of drugs
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by adulterating any drug or medical preparation in such a manner as to lessen the efficacy or change the operation of such drug or medical preparation, or to make it noxious, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Fake medicines causing death; Adulterated drugs sold as genuine

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to fire or combustible matter
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to fire or any combustible matter, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Fire due to electrical short circuit; Gas cylinder explosion in restaurant

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to poisonous substance
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any poisonous substance, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Pesticide poisoning; Chemical leak in factory

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to machinery
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any machinery, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Industrial accident due to unguarded machinery; Construction equipment failure

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to building, etc.
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any building, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Building collapse due to poor maintenance; Falling debris from construction site

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to animal
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act with respect to any animal in his possession, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Pet dog attack; Bull run amok in public place

title: Causing death by negligence relating to rash or negligent conduct with respect to any matter not specifically provided for
description: Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide, and for which no punishment is hereinbefore provided, shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years, or fine, or both
example_incidents: Any other negligent act causing death not covered by specific sections
